text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActRelationshipCheckpoint where concept is-a T

name: ActRelationshipCheckpointThrough
title: ActRelationshipCheckpointThrough
description: Condition must be true throughout the execution and the service is interrupted (asynchronously) as soon as the condition turns false (asynchronous WHILE loop). The service must be interruptible.
